item.title: Crewmember Interphone System(s) All Cargo Configuration – Flight Deck to Ground – Flight Interphone Inoperative

remarks.para: Flight interphone flight deck to ground/ground to flight deck function may be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: Alternate procedures are established and used, and
Nose gear service interphone jack is operative.
When the Flight Interphone Flight Deck to Ground system is inoperative, use the Service Interphone Flight Deck to Ground system.

placard.para: Placard Crewmember Interphone System Flight Deck to Ground "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
